summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RAT Detection System. All backend APIs (19/19) and frontend features working perfectly. AI analysis integration with Emergent LLM functional. Dashboard displays tactical dark theme with real-time threat monitoring.
passed_tests: All 19 backend API endpoints (status, scan, detections, AI analysis, network connections, statistics)
Dashboard loads with tactical dark theme
System status indicator shows correct threat level
All 4 stat cards display real-time data
Network activity chart with live data visualization
Detections table with 6 active threats displayed
AI Analysis buttons (8) functional with Emergent LLM integration
Resolve buttons (7) working for status updates
Quick Actions: Quick Scan, Refresh Connections, Refresh Status
Main Scan Now button with progress animation
No error messages or console errors found
